quote: A child's dream, and a misunderstood story--the beckoning of such things is not a falsehood
author: Rewrite the Saga

quote: Upon the ring of the midnight bell, I wonder whether to cast a spell that would allow me forget of you
author: Nemureru Mori no Cinderella

quote: With a life like this, and you absent for these present days, I just want to miss and be left behind by the bus
author: Kaisei no Bus ni Noru

quote: Am I a peach blossom, or a red spider lily?
author: Manjushage

quote: Please sew into me a love that won't disappear
author: Tachiiri Kinshi

quote: Dried sardines! Dried sardines! Domestically-produced! Domestically-produced!
author: Super Nuko ni Naritai

quote: Surely, aplenty are the things I don't want to understand, and so, I shut both eyes
author: Sekai Sick ni Shounen Shoujo

quote: To the point that no longer do I desire another sweet, does it appear that I love you
author: Shikioriori ni Tayutaite

quote: I know, but even so--upon hearing that voice, I was saved, and grew filled of you
author: Ouka ni Tsukiyo to Sode Shigure

quote: And still I fear, with my deep-rooted heart so frustrating
author: Yukoku, Yume to Mimagau

quote: Not taking the step forward that could never reach you, I still search for you without any idea of giving up
author: Terrestrial

quote: Let's search for it--love.. a love that won't wake up
author: I Sleep Well

quote: As time passes, why is it that you, too, must become an adult?
author: Ice Cream Complex

quote: My mouth is lonely, so I'll go buy a cotton candy
author: Yume no Mata Yume
